description:
Speed range of 200-12000 rpm Precise and independent control of speed and time

•  Easy operation with intuitive menu and LCD display

•  Maintenance-free brushless DC motor

•  Pulse operation for fast and convenient quick spins

• Advance features include speed/RCF switch; short-time run function; audible alert function

•  Safety features include door interlock, overspeed detector;over-temperature detector; automatic internal diagnosis and automatic rotor identification
PRODUCT PARAMETERS
Speed range
200-12000rpm, increment: 10rpm
Max. RCF
13680×g
Speed accuracy
±20
Rotor type
-
Rotor capacity
24×capillary tubes
Run time
30sec-99min/Continuous
Acceleration/Braking time
30s↑30s↓
Temperature setting range
-
Display
LCD
Power
160W
Voltage/Frequency
Single-phase, 200V-240V,50Hz/60Hz, 5A; 100V- 120V,50Hz/60Hz, 5A
Noise level
-
Motor type
Brushless DC motor
Dimensions[WxDxH]
280×364×274mm
Weight
10.5kg
Safety performance
Door interlock,Overspeed detector; Automatic internal diagnosis, Automatic rotor identification
Other functions
Speed/RCF switch; Short-time run function; sound-alert function MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Centrifuges in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Centrifuges with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
